Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for Avnet MT3620 SK
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Avnet Incorporated. All rights reserved.
// This file defines the mapping from the Avnet MT3620 Starter Kit (SK) to the
// 'sample appliance' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/Azure/azure-sphere-samples.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the Avnet MT3620 SK, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.
// See https://aka.ms/AzureSphereHardwareDefinitions for more information on how to use hardware abstractions,
// to enable apps to work across multiple hardware variants.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_1
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User Button A.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_BUTTON_2
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User Button B.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CONTROLLER
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: PWM LED controller

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Channel 1 for the PWM LED1 green. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the PWM Controller, SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CONTROLLER
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: ADC Potentiometer controller

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external potentiometer to ADC controller 0, channel 1 using CLICK1 AN. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the ADC Group Controller, SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_RED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED RED Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_GREEN
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED GREEN Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_BLUE
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED BLUE Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_UART_LOOPBACK
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect CLICK1 RX (RX) to CLICK1 TX (TX).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external LSM6DS3 to I2C using CLICK1, pin MISO (SDA) and pin MOSI (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external LSM6DS3 to SPI using CLICK1, pin MISO (MISO), pin SCK (SCLK), pin MOSI (MOSI) and CLICK2 pin CS (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SPI Chip Select (CS) value "B". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external NRF52 RESET signal using the PMOD connector: Pin-8.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external NRF52 DFU signal using the PMOD connector: Pin-7

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external NRF52 UART using the PMOD connector): (RX Pin-3), (TX Pin-2), (CTS Pin-1), and (RTS Pin-4).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_DEVICE_STATUS_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external red LED using CLICK1, pin PWM.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_PENDING_UPDATE_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external blue LED using CLICK1, pin PWM2.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DSO_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: LSM6DSO accelerometer.
